name: Ndab Wlek
description:
You are sent by the mayor of the town to help flatten the curve, because people wont listen and run around in public!! Your job is to throw, literally, people back into their houses, and will get paid in toilet paper in return. Keep in mind that your momentum will keep you going; the more people you throw back into their houses, the higher your momentum thus the better your performance!

You better hurry up though, for you have limited time. 

FLATTEN THE CURVE

CONTROLS:

WASD: Mobility

Shift: Zoom Out

Left Click: Hold + Throw people

By: William Abou Sharaf, Perla Abou Sharaf and Daniel Wazeer
